testCases.name: Functional Application Test
testCases.description: Verify the application has actual functionality beyond basic placeholder
steps: Verify login form is displayed with email and password fields
Verify multiple interactive elements exist (buttons, forms, links)
Check for proper navigation structure and routing
Verify application has real features, not just 'Vite + React' text
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application shows functional login system and interactive features
testCases.failureCondition: If page only shows 'Vite + React' placeholder, this test should FAIL

testCases.name: Authentication System Test
testCases.description: Test complete user authentication flow including login and registration
steps: Test registration with new user credentials
Verify successful registration redirects to dashboard
Verify protected routes redirect to login when not authenticated
Test session persistence across page refreshes
testCases.expectedOutcome: Complete authentication flow works with proper redirects and session management

testCases.name: Dashboard Functionality Test
testCases.description: Test main dashboard features and data display
steps: Verify activities list displays mock data
Check statistics show channel and member counts
testCases.expectedOutcome: Dashboard displays all sections with proper data and navigation

testCases.name: Navigation System Test
steps: Verify top navigation bar is present
Test routing to different sections (Calendar, Kanban, Settings)
testCases.expectedOutcome: All navigation elements work and routes function properly

testCases.name: UI Components Test
testCases.description: Test that UI components are properly implemented and styled
steps: Check for buttons and verify they're clickable and styled
Look for forms and input fields with proper styling
Verify Tailwind CSS styling is applied correctly
Check for loading spinners and states
testCases.expectedOutcome: Multiple interactive UI components found, functional, and properly styled

testCases.name: Workspace Features Test
testCases.expectedOutcome: Workspace features are accessible and functional

testCases.name: Real-time Features Test
testCases.expectedOutcome: Real-time features work with proper WebSocket connections

testCases.name: Task Management Test
testCases.description: Test Kanban board and task management features
steps: Test drag and drop functionality if available
testCases.expectedOutcome: Task management system is functional with proper CRUD operations

testCases.name: Document Collaboration Test
testCases.description: Test document editing and collaboration features
testCases.expectedOutcome: Document collaboration features work with real-time updates

testCases.name: Calendar Integration Test
testCases.description: Test calendar functionality and event management
testCases.expectedOutcome: Calendar system is functional with proper event management

testCases.name: User Settings Test
testCases.description: Test user profile and settings management
testCases.expectedOutcome: User settings are accessible and functional

testCases.name: Notification System Test
testCases.description: Test notification panel and alert system
testCases.expectedOutcome: Notification system works with proper real-time updates

testCases.name: Content Quality Test
testCases.description: Verify application has meaningful content and professional appearance
steps: Check page has substantial content beyond placeholder text
Verify proper heading structure and typography
Look for actual application features and functionality
Check for consistent branding and styling
Verify all text is meaningful and contextual
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application demonstrates real functionality and professional design

testCases.name: Error Handling Test
testCases.description: Test application error handling and edge cases
steps: Verify loading states during API calls
Check error message display and clarity
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application handles errors gracefully with proper user feedback

testCases.name: Performance Test
testCases.description: Test application performance and loading times
steps: Check for smooth navigation between pages
Verify responsive design on different screen sizes
Test application with multiple concurrent users
Check for memory leaks during extended use
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application performs well with reasonable load times and smooth interactions
